The human beings who in most admire are those withour sterling qualities but are extraordinary in their ordinariness, the unsung heroes who will never be in the limelight or boulevard of fame, people who do great things when no one is watching or those who are not marked with the maple leaves of chieftaincy titles. They only wear fate, hard work, perseverance, anonymity and time. Yet, they are passionate, caring, visionary, sincere, determined and honest. These qualities mold those that are special without being aware. I strive to stay true to some of these qualities that I admire. To find a person with a few of these qualities is rare these days. To know someone who has all of them is amazing and a true blessing. (Except from Tomorrow Left Us Yesterday - Tayo Olafioye)

From this passage, the people that the writer admire are
